transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (sitting at desk, reading a speech) ... but most of all, I'd like to take a moment to thank the one person who's made all of this possible... (close up) me, Space Ghost! Thank you, me!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Okay, everyone, on your toes, let's be really great tonight. I can see it now... first, the Cable Ace awards. Then the Emmy, Tony, Oscar, Shecky, Lulu, Dean Martin roast, Secret Squares, Star Search, spokesmodel...

transcript.speaker: Brak
transcript.dialogue: Let Brak do the intro! Live from Ghost Planet, it's Brak!

transcript.speaker: Brak
transcript.dialogue: La la la la la la la la la!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (Invisos in to set) Who let that little creep on? Didn't anyone listen to what I said? Didn't I just get through telling you, I want this show to be as smooth as a baby's...

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Like, we're on the air, man!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Er, uh, what? But, but I'm not ready! That, that little creep threw me off! Quick, start over!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: You jerk, Space Ghost, we're live! You can't start over!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Er, er, um, uh, well then, uh, everyone close your eyes!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (to camera) You too, home Citizens! (screen goes black) (sound of drums, glass breaking, chicken squawking) Ow!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (eyes still closed) Aaagh! Ayee! My eyelids are encrusted shut! Help me! Help meeeee!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (in low voice) Ten seconds and already this one's in the toilet. (normal voice) Oh, er, um, Greetings! I'm Space Host! (laughs) Woopsie daisy! As you can see, things are a little bit zany tonight, a little wacky, a little kooky (ripping sound)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: And that's because tonight's show's a real doozy! My guests are sassy comedic chanteuse, Sandra Bernhard, and... wait a second... Moltar, is this right? A mere hardware store owner, on tonight's award-winnable doozy?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: His name is Palmer Mills... nice guy.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: An average citizen? On my doozy? Moltar, what gives?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Eh, we got him dirt cheap.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (sighs) Uh, well, besides that star-studded line-up, we've added oodles of exciting new features to our show.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What's that, Zorak? What are these loads of excitement? Well, for starters, we have a live studio audience here in the studio! Completely live! (applause) We'll also be taking your live calls and questions, here at the Ghost Planet, live! (phone rings) Not now!

transcript.speaker: (Subtitles
transcript.dialogue: )do not call in...this is a cartoon joke showwhat are you, stupid?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: And finally, we'll have a human sacrifice! (does double take) What?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Before we start tonight's incredible show, let's say hello to our live studio audience. (shows audience full of mantises) Baba ghanoush, it's the lone audience of the apocalypse! Zorak, do you know these people?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Nein! Nein! What are you inferring, Space Ghost?

transcript.speaker: Uncle Judy
transcript.dialogue: (in Southern accent) Zo-rak! Zo-rak! Ovah heah!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Oh, uh, hi, Uncle Judy, Aunt Lars. Uh, sorry about Raymond.

transcript.speaker: Aunt Lars
transcript.dialogue: That's okay, we was gonna eat him up anaway.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Don't be such a jerk, Space Ghost.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: That's the second time you called me a jerk tonight!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Oh, my, Space Jerk can count!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Don't call me a jerk, Zorak! You... you... you jerk!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: I'm not a jerk! You're the jerk!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Jerk! (they both repeat "Jerk!" faster and faster)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Enough... We've wasted too much award-winning time! Moltar, first guest! Get Sandra on!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: My first guest is that wild and crazy girl of the minute, star of her own multi-something extravaganza, Sandra Bernhard!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Sorry, man, she, she's not ready.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh, this is great! Just dandy! Now I'll have to talk to that ordinary guest guy!

transcript.speaker: Salesman
transcript.dialogue: (appears on monitor) For your free copy...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (monitor changes again, shows Palmer Mills) Who's that?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh, terrific! Whoopee! Welcome to the show, plain old average garden variety non-celebrity citizen whoever.

transcript.speaker: Palmer Mills
transcript.dialogue: Glad to be with you today.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, I bet you are, Joe Plainfolks. (condescending) So, you own a hardware store! How nice! Any interesting stories to tell?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Nope, didn't think so. You know, I could bench press you from now 'til doomsday. What do you think of that, average citizen?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Think it'll rain today? How about those Dallas Cowboys? Boxers or briefs?

transcript.speaker: Palmer Mills
transcript.dialogue: Well, that's a rather pointed question...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well, isn't that what you average citizens talk about, hmmmm, huh, hmmmm? Answer me!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Some guest he is! Look at him, he's mundaning up my whole show! How can I win any awards with material like this? This show needs oomph, pizzazz, joy d'vivre! Moltar! Is Sandra ready yet?!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Plan B! Take some calls! (phone rings, he answers) Welcome to my shoe, caller, what would you like to talk to me about?

transcript.speaker: Caller 1
transcript.dialogue: Actually, I wanted to ask Mr. Mills what he thinks of Tim Allen.

transcript.speaker: Palmer Mills
transcript.dialogue: Tim Allen... let's see, he doesn't, he doesn't have a store in our, our town.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hey! I do the jokes here! Next caller! Hello? You're on the air with Space Ghost!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (recognizing that it's Lokar) Okay, I see how it is.

transcript.speaker: Caller 2
transcript.dialogue: Uh, hello, Mr. Mills? What would you suggest using for eradicating giant mantises?

transcript.speaker: Palmer Mills
transcript.dialogue: Sevin dust. Malathion. Either one of those would be great for it.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hmmm! Sevin dust in metal can. I'll have to remember that. Hey, you know something, Joe? That reminds me, maybe I should come to your store. I need to replace my... Orgone... Zargon... Zargonite...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I know how to say it, earthling! I am a talk show host, y'know. I know how to say things! I can say lots of things! Tuna fish! Parentheses! Coochie-coochie girl Charo! Zingnut Ranch!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: That cuts it, Hardware Boy! No skinny pink boy's gonna tell me how to say things on my show! Moltar! Get him off!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Everyone be quiet or I'll clear the room! Moltar! Sandra Bernhard, now!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (pause) Okay, okay, I think we should take a break. Now, let's go to break.

transcript.speaker: Audience
transcript.dialogue: Hail Brak! Hail Brak! Hail Brak! ...

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (in control room) Sorry about SG, man, he's, he's bein' a real jerk today.

transcript.speaker: Palmer Mills
transcript.dialogue: I was a little bit blundersome on some of them, wasn't I?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Oh, no, no, you were great, you were great. Are we still on for going fishin'? Is this weekend good for you?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh, hi! Heh heh, we're back to the show, where any day now my guest will be the lovely Sandra Bernhard. In the meantime, let's take some more calls, from you, the viewers. Hello, you're on the air.

transcript.speaker: Caller 3
transcript.dialogue: Hello, can I, can I speak to Mr. Mills?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Sorry, he's off the show. Next!

transcript.speaker: Caller 4
transcript.dialogue: Uh, yes, I have a question for Miss Bernhard.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Sorry, she's not in yet. Do you have a question or comment for me?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (sullen) Doesn't anyone want to speak to me? I'm the host... (angry) Next caller!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What a stupid question! Of course it is!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I don't get it. What's so darn funny?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You! Haven't I told you never to call me here? Moltar! Hang up!

transcript.speaker: Caller 8
transcript.dialogue: (actually Jan and Jace) (off-hook busy signal) Jerk!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Heh! It's for me! Yes, Citizen?

transcript.speaker: Caller 9
transcript.dialogue: Mr. Ghostal, I'm calling about your long distance service.

transcript.speaker: Caller 9
transcript.dialogue: If I could just have a moment of your time...

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Why are you such a jerk tonight, Space Ghost? Is it the loneliness?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hey! I'm not lonely! And I'm not a jerk!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Yes, yes! You're the loneliest jerkiest jerk! You're King Jerk!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Lord Jerk! Emperor Jerk! Pope of the Jerks!!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Jerk-meister, jerk-arino, jerk-enstein, jerk-o, beef-jerky, jerky beefaghetti boy, jerk-a-mundo!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Zorak, I am rubber, Zorak, and you are glue!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Only the Grand King Jerk would say that!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Oh, yeah, can you get that?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh, okay (answers the phone) Hello? (no response) Hello!

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Do you know who this is, Taddy-kins?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Good Lord! I know that voice! But it can't be! You're...

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: In the asylum? Oh no, Taddy boy, not anymore! I escaped last night!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Ohhh, just evil, pure and simple, that's all. Let's not discuss it.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No, he's my... (dramatic sting music) evil twin!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yes, my evil twin! Chad Ghostal! Doesn't everyone have an evil twin?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (pause) Ah, we walk alike, we talk alike...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Then, one day, a hot dog made him lose control.

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: (still on phone) Tad, do you remember when we were young, how I would make you cry. The ropes, Tad, remember the ropes? How I'd twist them and twist them, and keep twisting them until...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (nervous laughter) Can't talk now, Chad, got a talk show to do, you know. (invisos out)

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Wait for me, Tad, wait for me, I'll be right over! (evil laugh) (hangs up, off-hook busy signal)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (long pause while everyone looks in shock at the empty studio) Uh, Space Ghost,

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Is your evil twin a jerk too?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (invisos back in) I've had it with you, Mr. Funny Bug! You don't want me to win any awards, do you, Mr. Funny Bug?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Sandra, can't you see I'm in the middle of something?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (pause) Sandra! Moltar, why didn't you tell me she was ready? Uh, hello, Citizen Sandra! It's about time. I mean, welcome to the show!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Hey Sandra, what do you call Space Ghost drinking a root beer?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hey! I want a big laugh like Zorak! Moltar, get me a big laugh!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (throws switch, a really feeble single voice laugh comes out)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: That's a big laugh? Eh, heh, uh, Sandra, tell me about your super-powers.

transcript.speaker: Sandra Bernhard
transcript.dialogue: I can psychically read every thought inside of your mind right now, if you have any... wait, I have to take a moment to see if you're actually thinking.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (closes his eyes and thinks) (Need food, I'd love some tacos, mmmmm, chicken tacos! Refried beans!)

transcript.speaker: Sandra Bernhard
transcript.dialogue: Love some tacos, chicken tacos, refried beans... And a chimichanga!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Sandra, stop that! Get out of my mind! You're freaking me out!

transcript.speaker: Sandra Bernhard
transcript.dialogue: I'm the kind of girl you don't bring home to mother. Understand?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: That girl's al-l-l-right! She's real people!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Ahem! Let's take a call for Sandra. Hi, you're on the air!

transcript.speaker: Caller 10
transcript.dialogue: (heavy breathing) Sandra, can you tell what I'm thinking?

transcript.speaker: Sandra Bernhard
transcript.dialogue: Oh, I know what you're thinking, I can't talk about it on the Cartoon Network.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Let's have some serious calls, please! Next caller! Hello?

transcript.speaker: Caller 11
transcript.dialogue: (actually Brak) Do you have Prince Albert in a can?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Don't encourage them, Sandra! Next caller! We're speaking with Sandra Bernhard!

transcript.speaker: Caller 12
transcript.dialogue: Um, yeah, what's, uh, what's on after this? I, I lost my TV Guide.

transcript.speaker: Caller 13
transcript.dialogue: (female voice) Yeah, can I see your muscles?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Why, of course! Admire my wonderful...

transcript.speaker: Sandra Bernhard
transcript.dialogue: (rolls up sleeve) Okay, well, I'm not going to show you all of them, but I will show you this one. (flexes bicep) Not bad, huh?

transcript.speaker: Caller 14
transcript.dialogue: Mr. Tad Ghostal? This is Herb Mosh of the IRS...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What's wrong with you people? Next caller, now!

transcript.speaker: Caller 15
transcript.dialogue: The tingler, the tingler is loose in the theatre, scream, scream for your lives!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Sandra, years from now, when you talk about this, and you will, ple-e-ease, be kind!

transcript.speaker: Salesman
transcript.dialogue: (appears on monitor) Oh, there we are... (zaps off again)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: All right! That's it! I've had it! Moltar! Stop the tape!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: This isn't a talk show, it's a freak show! Get out! Get out, all of you! The show's over! Out with you!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Good luck getting an award for this one, Space Ghost!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I don't care! I don't need any awards! I don't need any of you! I'm Space Ghost, the rest of you are all cogs, extras, faces in the crowd, 9-to-5 nobodies! You're all cannon fodder, you hear? You're the guys in red shirts on "Star Trek". Get out! (sound of everyone leaving the studio) Well, I sure blew it. I'll never get any awards after this fiasco! Never never never! It's so unfair! I feel like such a jerk! (pause) Why, it sure is creepy in here, with no one around. (pause) Hey! If I'm all alone here... then who's behind the camera?
